## Synopsis

In this project the tallest building of the world namely 'Burj Khalifa' is located 
on the map using leaflet.

## Burj Khalifa on the map
In this section map is drawn and 'Burj Khalifa' is pointed on the map using leaflet
library.

```{r message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat = 25.197525,lng = 55.274288,popup = "Burj Khalifa")
my_map
```
